name: v1.11.5 Update
body:
## FAQ
 - Check https://jenkins.badbones69.com/view/Legacy/job/Crazy-Crates-Legacy/ for 1.17.1 & below builds!

## Added:
- N/A

## Changes:
- Permissions got a face lift and are different from before, Check out https://github.com/Crazy-Crew/Crazy-Crates/wiki/Commands-and-Permissions.
- You can read the rest of the changes @ https://github.com/Crazy-Crew/Crazy-Crates/pull/426

## Fixed:
- Patched up some double logging.

name: v1.10.5 Update
body:
## Added:
- 1.19 Support

## Changes:
- QuadCrates will only be enabled on Paper.
- Code improvements
- Graceful switches between paper & spigot events.

## Fixed:
- #422 
- Fixed placeholderapi hook not registering.

## Notes:
- /cc save <schematicName> is currently disabled for the time being.
- Download the zip in 1.10.4 if you want legacy support.

name: v1.10.4 Update
body:
## Added:
- N/A

## Fixed:
- Custom heads now work properly. ( Badbones69 )
- Offline keys now load properly.

## Note:
- No other notable changes.
- If you wish to use CC on MC 1.8.8-1.17.1 then use CC v1.10.2. Both Jars will be located in the .zip file that can be found below.

name: v1.10.3 Update
body:
## Added:
- Support for MC 1.18.2 **ONLY** - *MC 1.18 & 1.18.1 must update*
- DecentHolograms is now supported.

## Fixed:
- QuadCrates now properly work.
- /tellraw can be used without the plugin parsing the hex colors in it.
- Patched a dupe bug
- Only give virtual keys when its not CrateOnTheGo
## Changed:
- Removed MC 1.8.8-1.17.1 support and will be using only the latest MC version from now on.

## Note:
- If you wish to use CC on MC 1.8.8-1.17.1 then use CC v1.10.2. Both Jars will be located in the .zip file that can be found below.

name: v1.10.2 Update - 1.17.1 & Below ONLY!
body:
## Added:
- DecentHolograms is now supported.

## Fixed:
- QuadCrates now properly work.
- /tellraw can be used without the plugin parsing the hex colors in it.
- Patched a dupe bug
- Only give virtual keys when its not CrateOnTheGo
- Fix an invalid item in the 1.12.2-Down Basic.yml
- Add an extra crate example for CrateOnTheGo for 1.12.2-Down

## Changed:
- Removed 1.18 support as this release is only for 1.17 and below.

name: v1.10.1 Update
body:
## Added:
- 1.16 support ~ HexedHero PR
- Added tab complete to forceopen command.
- Added new event PlayerReceiveKeyEvent.
- Added %slot% placeholder to name and lore of mystery item for Cosmic.
- Added Removed-Physical-Crate message to Messages.yml.
- GUIMenu can add Unbreakable and HideItemFlags ~ tienthanh2929 PR
- Prizes now can have Unbreakable and HideItemFlags ~ tienthanh2929 PR

## Fixed:
- Crate previews when set to a slot size the with the same amount of prizes would cause the crate to have an extra page instead of just filling it at the max slots.
- Added SPLASH_POTION to potion types.
- Fixed some color code not working on button items.
- Fixed cosmic no key message not using the Messages.yml.
- Setting inventory names to &0[] would cause players to be able to take items out of the GUIs.
- Some plugins that had an inventory name set to nothing caused an issue in CC to block them from working. 
- Holograms plugin wasn't spawning the holograms.
- Fixed issue with auto claiming items when opening QuickCrate.

## Changed:
- When adding items with the editor it now sets the display item, name, lore, and amount to the generated prize instead of a placeholder item.
- If you do not add any tier options to your Cosmic crate type file then the plugin will disable the crate due to Cosmic crate type needing to have tiers.

name: v1.10 Update
body:
## Fixed:
- An issue with off-hand keys not being taken from QuickCrate.
- Fixed up the sound system.
- Fixed NPE on plugin disable.
- Setting ChestLines: option to under 3 works now when border disabled.
- Fixed CSGO's pointer being a broken block.
- IllegalArgumentException when Need-Key-Sound: option is set to nothing.
- When adding a Papi placeholder to an item reward it would only work 1 time due to not grabbing a new instance of the reward but instead using the same one that was already overwritten.

## Changed:
- Old /cc open as been renamed to /cc forceopen as its a better fit as it will open a crate for a player for free.
- Display items for prizes now use NBT tags to help lower resource usage and make it much more reliable to find out what prize is what.
- Optimized Preview class.
- Updated NBT Api for 1.15.1.

## Added:
- Updated to support 1.15.1.
- Added Hologram support for HolographicDisplays and Holograms.
- Added a new Converter for the plugin called CratesPlus.
- New messages in Messages.yml for converter messages.
  - `Crates-Plus: message for when the crates from CratesPlus have been loaded.`
  - `No-Files-To-Convert: '&cNo plugins that can be converted were found.'`
  - `Error-Converting-Files: '&cThere was an error while trying to convert files. Please check the console for the error log.'`
- `/cc convert` command to convert supported plugin's crate files to Crazy Crate's crate files.
  - This converter will allow users to easily convert their config.yml from CratesPlus to Crazy Crate's file system. Crazy Crates does not support all the same features as CratesPlus and as such can't convert all crates and their settings perfectly.
- New `/cc open <crate> [player]` command now will try and open a crate for a player if they have a key. If they do not then it will deny them and give them a little knock-back like when right-clicking a physical crate with no key. This makes it possible to use something like an NPC as a crate instead of a physical crate. Though the command will not open any physical-based crates.
- Aliases for `/cc forceopen` `/cc fopen` `/cc fo`
- Items: option can now use flags to add to items. Just add the flag as an option and it will add to the item.
- Flags: option has been added to display items so the display items can now use flags as well.
  - List of Flags: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/inventory/ItemFlag.html
- Potions can now use the same color code as Leather Armor.
- New Patterns: option can be used in the Display Item to display colored banners and shields.
- You can now use patterns in the Items: option to give colored banners and shields to players.
  - Usage: `<Pattern>:<Color>`
- New Command `/cc transfer <crate> <player> [amount]` is used for transferring virtual keys from player to player.
  - This can be used as a way for players to sell their virtual keys to each other.
- New messages in the Messages.yml file for the new command.
  - `Same-Player: '&cYou can't use this command on yourself.'`
  - `Not-Enough-Keys: '&cYou do not have enough keys to transfer.'`
  - `Transferred-Keys: '&7You have transferred %amount% %crate% keys to %player%.'`
  - `Received-Transferred-Keys: '&7You have received %amount% %crate% keys from %player%.'`

name: v1.9.11 Update
body:
Added:
- Tipped arrows have been re-added as they were removed quite a while ago but since I have a wiki for something that didn't work I thought I should fix it up and make it work again.
Example: `- 'Item:Tipped_Arrow:SLOW'`
- Leather Armor can now be colored. There are 2 options for this. 
1. The color name directly.
2. Use the R,G,B color code to set a specific color.
Example: `- 'Item:Leather_Chestplate:Blue'` `- 'Item:Leather_Chestplate:0,0,255'`
- You can now add Custom Model Data to items in the display items or prizes. If you wish to use them then you need to use a `#` instead of `:` so CC can know it is a data number. 
Usage: `<ID>:<Durability>#<CustomModelData>`
Examples:
1. `- 'Item:Wool:14#12'`
2. `- 'Item:Apple#3'`
- `No-Prizes-Found` message in the Messages.yml for when no prizes are found in a crate.
- `PhysicalCrateKeyCheckEvent` is called when the built-in key checker for a physical crate has been called. This is used to disable the built-in check so other developers can disable it and implement their checkers for specific stuff. Canceling the event will disable the checking. This does not disable the preview opener and the menu opener on physical crates.
- Close inventory automatically after 2 seconds for CSGO, Cosmic, and Roulette.

Fixed:
- Menu option was missing from the /cc set command.
- Players opening a quad crate could open physical menu crates.
- If there is a block where a chest spawns for a quad-crate it will disappear and not show back up at the end of the animation.
- When quad-crate places the old block states back to remove its platforms it put the item type back but never added back the data for each block. This caused issues with Blocks like player heads as they would lose their skins and show as a normal skeleton head/player head.
- Fixed an NPE when a player tries to open a crate with no prizes that they can win. Either the player has won all the prizes or there are none in the crate.
- Fixed an NPE when trying to open a broken physical crate.
- Fixed some enchantment names not being found as enchantments.
- Fixed an NPE from 1.8.8 servers.
- Fixed an NPE from mob eggs with no ids.

Changed:
- Changed item ID in 1.13 default crate file.

name: v1.9.10 Release
body:
## Added:
- Now checks Off-Hand when checking for a key.
- Players opening a crate can no longer pick up items. This is due to users inventories getting full when opening a crate and caused issues.
- PlaceholderAPI placeholders can now be added to the following options. Commands, Items(Name and Lores), and Messages for each prize.

### PlaceholderAPI Examples:
Items: 
`- 'Item:Diamond_Sword, Name:&6%player_name%''s Sword, Lore:&cThis sword created just for &7%player_name%,&cCreated on: &6%server_time_MM:dd:yy%'`
Commands:
`- 'broadcast &7%player_name% has just won his very own sword.'`
Messages:
`- '&7Congratulations on owning your very own sword %player_name%!'`

## Fixed:
- Physical Crates did not take keys from the off-hand.
- NPE when trying to open a physical crate with another crate key.
- Player Heads would not load a skin when using the player's name on 1.8.8 servers.
- When using the open all feature with the QuickCrate crate type it would only consume 1 key at a time in some situations.
- 1.14+ enchantments did not get added when using the DisplayEnchantments: option on display items.

## Changed:
- Placeholder items for page buttons have been changed to be the same item as the border item for the preview.

name: v1.9.9 Release
body:
# Fixed:
- Normal items could be used to open crates as it removed ALL NBT tags when checking. 06721ea8231cd89d7c71ed6475329a6ebd53e749
- When failing to open a crate with a key it always denies you. 98575cd7cd7947dcfd868f5813221e69204a143a
- NPE from the NBT strip method. eef59354fbaed8b499dbd5cbcfdd21a2e5183c44
- Crate Locations with bad crates now do not cause a NPE. 7705865f3631e200fac8f9f73274d0714302b0a6
- FireCracker didn't work due to Quick crate trying to take a key that is set to Free but returns false check due to the free key not returning true. f212b66707f8cc2254011e374997d3198dd1f17b
- NPE from 1.8.8 servers. 040d9fa8451c217fb803222b330713046eb27497
- NPE when the BroadCast: option is missing from the crate file. e69cf217ffc2716d060ccfd4422bf0c6b98ea5ba
- Virtual crates had to have the player hold the key in their hand. d4d55cd3351734f7f0ad2ea6814ef06c5b868756

# Changes:
- Recoded the Messages class to be cleaner and more efficient. 48666b73edc67e6d25c9e5bb0599bdeea7b7c9b4 32c92a91b1ae8e3e1bedd8f7eaa3a58191de156e 0e7d369e94920481c21b3f36ac216d133ce3776c

# Added:
- More methods and objects now have javadocs. 77dc013397ff20cccc8c180931a4e25a22580986 8669e7c5cdb3b187ff0a7dbb2dc9c502d2d50d07
- Another check for if an item is a key. 5181eac2fa9e275e6a151cc4837d28c226147a8c

name: v1.9.9 Dev Build v2
body:
Changes:
- Recoded the Messages class to be cleaner and more efficient. 48666b73edc67e6d25c9e5bb0599bdeea7b7c9b4 32c92a91b1ae8e3e1bedd8f7eaa3a58191de156e 0e7d369e94920481c21b3f36ac216d133ce3776c

Added:
- More methods and objects now have javadocs. 77dc013397ff20cccc8c180931a4e25a22580986 8669e7c5cdb3b187ff0a7dbb2dc9c502d2d50d07

Fixed:
- Crate Locations with bad crates now do not cause a NPE. 7705865f3631e200fac8f9f73274d0714302b0a6
- FireCracker didn't work due to Quick crate trying to take a key that is set to Free but returns false check due to the free key not returning true. f212b66707f8cc2254011e374997d3198dd1f17b
- NPE from 1.8.8 servers. 040d9fa8451c217fb803222b330713046eb27497
- NPE when the BroadCast: option is missing from the crate file. e69cf217ffc2716d060ccfd4422bf0c6b98ea5ba

name: v1.9.9 Dev Build v1
body:
### Description:
Due to the issues from the NBT tags I am releasing a development build instead of a full release as I want to make sure to fix these issues before the final release.

### Fixed:
- Normal items could be used to open crates as it removed ALL NBT tags when checking. 06721ea8231cd89d7c71ed6475329a6ebd53e749
- When failing to open a crate with a key it always denies you. 98575cd7cd7947dcfd868f5813221e69204a143a
- NPE from the NBT strip method. eef59354fbaed8b499dbd5cbcfdd21a2e5183c44

name: v1.9.8 Release
body:
Added:
- New checks to make sure a key is taken from the player before starting a crate. This will make sure that if the key fails to be taken it will NOT open a crate. Otherwise, this allows a player to keep opening crates forever. 4ea2f6cb9ca8095a214d3cd77756f52b3464a902

Changed:
- Updated the FileManager class. 47193959ff54476befc5d9626e534d7e6108f9ab
- Crates now do 3 different checks to see if a key is a key for that crate. 4ea2f6cb9ca8095a214d3cd77756f52b3464a902
- 1. Checks to see if the key is EXACTLY the same as a key item should be.
- 2. Checks if the NBT tag matches a crate.
- 3. Removes the NBT tags from both items to see if they match each other.

Fixed:
- NPE from when keys with no names are used. 12d47ca52fbbf4f6d1d4357aae3544739c209ef5
- When setting a key as just a plan item with no name or lore you could no longer use it as a key because of it checking for an nbt tag and due to how item stacks are checked. e5efaf615b7fba2cc9924b88b2cbf600b48bfb61
- Being able to open an infinite amount of crates while having the key NOT in the 1st hot-bar slot. It now just checks the item in the player's hand. 4ea2f6cb9ca8095a214d3cd77756f52b3464a902
- Keys not being able to open some crates. 4ea2f6cb9ca8095a214d3cd77756f52b3464a902
- Using the same key for multiple crates would not work due to per crate nbt tags. 4ea2f6cb9ca8095a214d3cd77756f52b3464a902

name: v1.9.7 Release
body:
Fixed:
- Crate Control had a strange ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException issue with some servers. 152645a7bd0c6c69169bfb22fdbdde610abcd2dc
- NPE from 1.8.8 servers when hitting a crate with their fists. 6a8f1fef103591a85c9058ecdce4eeb76753705b

Changed:
- Preview button placeholders now are disabled if the border is toggled off. b1efc0121aa7c510c8c648759483a7fcbb464651
- Keys now get an item type check if NBT tags are needed to be checked. 9a3f7172bbda39a90794c45e8a02eea2a2940ac3

name: v1.9.6 Release
body:
Added:
- GUICustomizer: option can now use `Player:` option for heads.
- Crate's Display item can now use the `Player:` option for heads.

Fixed:
- A few NPE that would show when opening crates.
- Prizes with no chance caused NPE errors and broke the crate.
- Prizes using decimals caused NPE errors and broke the crate.
- CrateOnTheGo no longer knocks back players when they right-click a crate with the key in their head.
- A conflicting issue with TokenEnchantments.
Token enchantments update the lore of an item to show invisible enchantments which CC uses to make the keys glow. Due to this it causes errors in the console and caused keys to not work as they did not match what the key item should look like. Keys now use NBT tags to help work around this issue.

Optimized:
- `FireworkAPI` class has been recoded for much better performance.

name: v1.9 Dev Build v1
body:
This is a pre-release to help test for any issues that might be found before the actual release.

Added:
- 1.8.8-1.12.2 support has been re-added due to the high number of requests.
- QuadCrate is now available from 1.8.8-1.14.2.
- Previews can now be controlled per crate in each crate's file.
- Preview boarders can now be toggled off.
- Preview glass color can now be changed and can be set to different items.
- Cosmic tiers can now be set to any kind of item they wish.
- If broadcast message is empty but enabled it will no longer send blank messages and will now be auto toggled off.
- Preview-Disabled message now added to message a player if that crate's preview is disabled.
- "/cc set1/set2" command for when setting the positions for the new schematic.
- "/cc save <schematic file name>" command to save the new schematic to the schematics folder.

Changes:
- Chest direction has been moved from NMS to the QuadCrateSession class due to finding a way to do it without NMS.
- Overhaul on the way particle locations for QuadCrate's spiral particle locations are calculated. Instead of all locations in a circle, it just grabs each location per haft of the spiral per location.
- QuadCrate class recode to now be much more legible and now only controls what the player does while opening the crate.
- QuadCrateSession class now hold all info per QuadCrate opened. Makes controlling everything much easier.
- QuadCrate timer for afk players was moved to a variable in the CrazyCrates class to makes it easier to grab.
- QuadCrate for MC 1.13+ will be using the .nbt schematics due to old .schematic folders not being up to date.
- All files for 1.8.8-1.12.2 will be grabbed from the 1.12.2-Down folders and files and 1.13+ will grab from the 1.13-Up files and folders.
- Random spelling mistakes fixed.
- Sounds effects have been redone so that they support the different sound names 1.9+ has compared to 1.8.8.
- Split code for item pickup events due to 1.11.2- using different event then 1.12+.
- Renamed default schematic files to use lowercase names.
